description: - git clone https://github.com/NingFeng33/Project4800.git - cd Project4800 - npm init -y - npm install express mysql2 dotenv bcryptjs mysql2 # making all your work in your own branch under 'dev' branch # merge your work into dev branch # dev branch will syn to server due to cliet's check by week # To start the project: - npm start  # you should see the info on console:   * Database connected successfully!   * Server running on http://localhost:3000
